net.jodah.lyra.config

Interface ConsumerConfig

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChannelConfig, ConfigurableChannel, ConfigurableConnection, ConnectionConfig
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Config

    public interface ConsumerConfig
    Consumer related configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<ConsumerListener> getConsumerListeners()
      Returns the consumer listeners else empty list if none were configured.
      boolean isConsumerRecoveryEnabled()
      Returns whether consumer recovery is enabled.
      ConsumerConfig withConsumerListeners(ConsumerListener... consumerListeners)
      Sets the consumerListeners to call on consumer related events.
      ConsumerConfig withConsumerRecovery(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether consumer recovery is enabled or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getConsumerListeners

        Collection<ConsumerListener> getConsumerListeners()
        Returns the consumer listeners else empty list if none were configured.
        See Also:
        getConsumerListeners()

      • isConsumerRecoveryEnabled

        boolean isConsumerRecoveryEnabled()
        Returns whether consumer recovery is enabled. Defaults to true when channel recovery is configured.
        See Also:
        withConsumerRecovery(boolean)

      • withConsumerListeners

        ConsumerConfig withConsumerListeners(ConsumerListener... consumerListeners)
        Sets the consumerListeners to call on consumer related events.

      • withConsumerRecovery

        ConsumerConfig withConsumerRecovery(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether consumer recovery is enabled or not.
